summary: Language switching feature (react-i18next) tested successfully. All language toggle features working correctly - Turkish/English switching, translations for sidebar menu and appearance section, language persistence via localStorage.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Language switching feature is fully functional. Language buttons have data-testid attributes: 'lang-tr-btn' and 'lang-en-btn'. Language is saved to localStorage with key 'language'. Theme toggle still works after i18n integration with data-testid: 'theme-dark-btn' and 'theme-light-btn'.

language_toggle_turkish.details: Clicking 'Türkçe' button switches UI to Turkish - all labels translate correctly

language_toggle_english.details: Clicking 'English' button switches UI to English - all labels translate correctly

language_persistence.details: Language persists across page navigation - localStorage saves 'language' key correctly

sidebar_menu_translations.details: Turkish: Profil Ayarları, Hesap Güvenliği, Bildirimler, Gizlilik, Görünüm, Hesap İşlemleri | English: Profile Settings, Account Security, Notifications, Privacy, Appearance, Account

appearance_section_translations.details: Turkish: Görünüm, Tema, Koyu Mod, Açık Mod, Dil | English: Appearance, Theme, Dark Mode, Light Mode, Language

theme_toggle_after_i18n.details: Theme toggle still works correctly after i18n integration - HTML class changes between 'dark' and 'light'

test_flow: 4. Verify language buttons are present (Türkçe and English)
5. Click 'Türkçe' button - verify all labels change to Turkish
6. Click 'English' button - verify all labels change to English
7. Switch to Turkish, navigate to /home, verify language persists
8. Navigate back to /settings, verify language still persists
9. Test theme toggle (Light/Dark) - verify still works after i18n integration
